line.originaltext: 2 1/2 tablespoons olive oil
3 tablespoons plain yogurt
2 tablespoons distilled white vinegar
1 medium onion, sliced
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 tablespoon ginger paste
2 small green chile peppers
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
2 tablespoons garam masala
1 tablespoon dried mint
salt and pepper to taste
5 sprigs cilantro
1 (3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces
line.annotation: create_ing(ing12, "1 (3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces")

line.originaltext: 2 quarts water
4 cups uncooked basmati rice
1 bay leaf
4 pods green cardamom
1 pod black cardamom
1 cinnamon stick
salt to taste
1/4 teaspoon powdered yellow food coloring
line.annotation: create_ing(ing20, "1/4 teaspoon powdered yellow food coloring")

line.originaltext: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t0, ing21, "hot oil", "heat over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Mix in the yogurt and vinegar.
Place the onion in the skillet, and cook until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing3, t0, ing23, "cooked onion", "cook until tender")

line.originaltext: Mix in the garlic, ginger paste, green chile peppers, and tomatoes.
line.annotation: combine({ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing24, "mixed veggies", "mix")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir until tomatoes are tender.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing22, ing23, ing24}, ing25, "stuff in skillet", "mix")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir until tomatoes are tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing25, t0, ing26, "cooked stuff", "cook until tomatoes are tender")

line.originaltext: Season with garam masala, mint, salt, and pepper, and mix in the cilantro.
Season with garam masala, mint, salt, and pepper, and mix in the cilantro.
Place the chicken in the skillet.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing28}, ing29, "chicken and sauce", "place chicken in skillet")

line.originaltext: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and continue cooking 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until chicken juices run clear.
line.annotation: cook(ing29, t0, ing30, "cooked chicken", "reduce heat to medium-low, cover, cook for 45 min, stir occasionally until juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Bring the water and rice to a boil in a large pot.
Bring the water and rice to a boil in a large pot.
Bring the water and rice to a boil in a large pot.
line.annotation: cook(ing31, t1, ing32, "cooking rice", "bring to boil")

line.originaltext: Mix in the bay leaf, green cardamom, black cardamom, and cinnamon.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing16, ing17, ing18, ing32}, ing33, "seasoned rice", "mix in")

line.originaltext: Season with salt to taste.
Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing34, t1, ing35, "cooked rice", "cover reduce to low heat and simmer for 20 min")

line.originaltext: In a separate pot, alternate the rice and chicken mixture in layers, topping with rice.
In a separate pot, alternate the rice and chicken mixture in layers, topping with rice.
line.annotation: combine({ing30, ing35}, ing36, "rice chicken", "alternate in layers")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with the food coloring, and mix to serve.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing36}, ing37, "ready to servce food", "sprinkle")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with the food coloring, and mix to serve.
